interactions.user_message: Hello, I need information on your medical services.
interactions.reference_reply: We offer a variety of dental services including routine check-ups, surgical procedures, and restorative treatments. If you have specific questions or need to book an appointment, feel free to ask!

interactions.user_message: I want to book an appointment next Monday to remove my wisdom tooth
interactions.reference_reply: Your SURGICAL appointment with Dr. Trafalgar D. Water Law is booked for 2023-10-30.

interactions.user_message: Do I need to do any paperwork beforehand?
interactions.reference_reply: Yes, we recommend completing any necessary paperwork before your appointment to ensure a smooth visit. You can usually find the forms on our website or arrive a bit early to fill them out at the clinic.
